title: High-Tech Treasure Hunt
description: High-Tech Treasure Hunt begins with the story of two kids who share the same love of games-sixteen-year-old Hee Jung, an exchange student, and Trey, a fifth grader. When it is time for Hee Jung to return to South Korea, she gives Trey a parting gift: an elaborate treasure hunt using all the latest technology. As Trey's teenage brother Sol helps him on the hunt, the brothers become closer.
highFrequencyWords: coordinates, exchange student, GPS, hosted, Internet, master, Metro, online, profile, smartphone, treasure hunt, website
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
awareness: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
